          <title>
            <string language="en">Foam and fibre insulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schaumgummi- und Faserisolierung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Isolation de mousse et de fibre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isolação da espuma e da fibra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Isolamento della fibra e della gomma piuma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μόνωση αφρού και ινών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aislante de la espuma y de la fibra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that trapped air inside foam and fibres make them good insulators.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fibres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">foams</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat conductors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat insulators</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Insulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trapped air</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß aufgefangene Luft 
innerhalb des Schaumgummis und Fasern sie gute Isolierungen bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'air emprisonné à 
l'intérieur de la mousse et les fibres leur font de bons isolateurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o ar prendido dentro
da espuma e as fibras lhes fazem isoladores bons.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'aria bloccata 
all'interno di gomma piuma e le fibre rendono loro i buoni isolanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ο παγιδευμένος αέρας 
μέσα στον αφρό και οι ίνες τους κάνουν τους καλούς μονωτές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el aire atrapado 
dentro de la espuma y las fibras les hacen buenos aisladores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
